titles.title: American Family Farm and Ranchland Protection Act of 2010
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitations on the amount excluded from the gross estate with respect to land subject to a qualified conservation easement.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/22/2010--Introduced. American Family Farm and Ranchland Protection Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $5 million the limitation on the estate tax exclusion for land subject to a qualified conservation easement and to increase the percentage of the value of such land that is excludable.
